full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN 'GRO'I DPAL MGON RJE BTZUN NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHABS KYI RNAM THAR GSOL 'DEBS DANG PA'I SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005B (CES BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN 'GRO'I DPAL MGON ^RJE BTZUN DAM PA RIN PO CHE NGAG DBANG BLO BZANG CHOS KYI NYI MA BSTAN 'DZIN DBANG PHYUG DPAL BZANG PO'I ZHAL SNGA NAS KYI GSANG GSUM RNAM THAR RGYA MTSO LTA BU LAS CHU THIG TZAM ZHIG RJES SU DRAN PA'I SGO NAS BSTOD CING GSOL BA BTAB PA'I TSIGS SU BCAD PA SKAL BZANG DAD PA'I SGO 'BYED CES BYA BA 'DI NI, SNGA MO NAS DGE BSHES DHARMA TZAKRAS DNGUL TAm LHA DAR BCAS BSKUL BA DANG, NYE CHAR CHOS KYI SBUN ZLA BA 'GA' YIS KYANG RAB DKAR LHA RDZAS BCAS BSKUL ZHING RANG NYID KYIS KYANG DAD PAS MTSAMS @006A *, ,SBYAR TE SA MTHA'I BTZUN CHUNG GYI NA BA, ^MGON DE'I BKA' LUNG GIS NOM CHI PI LIG THU AE RTE NI MER KEN SHE DAR CHOS RJER BSNGAGS RAM PA BLO BZANG CHOS 'DZIN GYIS SUG BRIS SU BGYIS PA DGE LEGS 'PHEL, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO KUN BSHES GNYEN DAM PA'I MGON GYIS MI 'BRAL PAR DGYES BZHIN RJES SU 'DZIN PA'I RGYUR GYUR CIG , ,,` AOm SVA STI, RGYAL KUN MKHYEN RAB DBANG PO 'JAM PA'I DBYANGS, ,MTHON MTHING ZUR PHUNG BREGS TE NGUR SMRIG GI ,GAR ROL RJE BTZUN CHOS KYI NYI MA YI, ZHABS PAD LAN BRGYAR DRAN PAS PHYAG BGYI'O, ,GANG DE'I GSANG GSUM MDZAD PA'I RNAM PAR THAR, RAB GSAL GSOL 'DEBS GSER GYI A'A DARSHA, ,DAD LDAN GSOL DPON BKRA SHIS NYI MA YIS, ,CHOS SBYIN 'DZAD MED DPAR GYI SGO 'PHAR PHYE, DGE 'DIS 'GRO KUN DAM PA'I MGON GYIS BZUNG, ,KHYAD PAR MGON KHYOD RIGS LDAN DRAG POR BZHENGS, ,RDZOGS LDAN BSTAN PA'I 'OD SNANG 'BAR BA'I TSE, ,GSUNG GI BDUD RTZIS SMIN CING GROL BAR SHOG , ,,)
